content: Dilbert on User Interface Design Design By: Rand Fishkin October 18, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin October 18, 2005 Dilbert on User Interface Design Design The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Scottie Claiborne, who co-authors the hilarious ISOS blog and who bought me lunch on her last trip into Seattle, delivers this stellar work of art at a forum thread at HighRankings. Thank goodness for Scottie - if it wasn't for her (and last night's Colbert Report - which aired again at 8pm), I'd be a soulless, humorless machine today. BTW - For those interested, arch-nemeses Bill O'Reilly and Jon Stewart will be going at it tonight on the Daily Show. As always, I'm making no political statement - just pointing out a half-hour of television that I believe will be enjoyable. Copied! Back to Top
